banner.banner_text: I mainly focus on MERN Stack development but I also have knowledge in Web Design.

sobreMi.sobreMi_text1: I define myself as a responsable person capable of solving problems that may appear. I´m perseverant and have ease teamworking. I´m interested in learning and keep improving throught my career as well as being part of work proyects.
sobreMi.sobreMi_text2: Something personal about me is that I love sports. (Playing them more than watching them).

proyectos.pro_item1_text: This is the first website I made while studying Frontend development at Coderhouse. Designed and developed using: Figma - HTML - CSS
proyectos.pro_item2_text: Boid Universe is one of the biggest projects I made to date, formed by various web pages. Designed and developed using: Figma - HTML - SCSS - Javascript - React js
proyectos.pro_item3_text: The TM Representaciones website was one of the last proyects I´ve made as a freelancer. Designed and developed using: Figma - HTML - SCSS - Javascript
proyectos.pro_item4_text: I made this Ecommerce while studying Backend development at Coderhouse. Developed using: EJS - SCSS - Javascript - Node js - Express - MongoDB
proyectos.pro_item5_text: The Animus Systems website comes from the gratifying performance of the previous Landing Page. Designed and developed using: Figma - HTML - SCSS - Javascript
proyectos.pro_item6_text: This Landing Page was one of my first projects as a freelancer. Designed and developed using: Figma - HTML - SCSS - Javascript
